TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed AspNetCompatibilityRequirementsMode extends System.Enum

summary.span: 指定 Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) 服务是否以与 ASP.NET 兼容的模式运行或是否可以运行。

span.span: Specifies whether a Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) service runs, or can run, in a mode that is compatible with ASP.NET.

remarks.format: ## Remarks [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] 兼容模式允许 [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] 服务使用 ASP 功能（如标识模拟）。 compatibility mode allows [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] services to use ASP features such as identity impersonation. 该服务是通过 Web.config 文件在应用程序级别启用的，并且无法由嵌套在应用程序中的 Web.config 文件重写。It is enabled at the application level through the Web.config file and cannot be overridden by Web.config files nested in the application. 当服务未指定值，它获取默认情况下允许行为。When the value is not specified for a service, it gets Allowed behavior by default. 有关详细信息，请参阅[ <serviceHostingEnvironment>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/servicehostingenvironment.md)。For more information, see [<serviceHostingEnvironment>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/servicehostingenvironment.md). ## Examples 服务开发人员可以确保其服务仅运行在 ASP.NET 兼容模式下通过设置属性为必需，如下面的示例中所示：Service developers can ensure that their service is only run in ASP.NET Compatibility Mode by setting the property on the to Required as shown in the following example: [!code-csharp[S_AspNetCompatibility#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_aspnetcompatibility/cs/service.cs#1)] [!code-vb[S_AspNetCompatibility#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_aspnetcompatibility/vb/service.vb#1)] [!code-csharp[S_AspNetCompatibility#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_aspnetcompatibility/cs/service.cs#2)] [!code-vb[S_AspNetCompatibility#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_aspnetcompatibility/vb/service.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.ServiceModel.Activation.AspNetCompatibilityRequirementsMode Allowed = int32(1)

Docs.summary: [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] 服务可以在 [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] 兼容模式设置为 或 的应用程序域中运行。 services can run in an application domain with [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] compatibility mode set to or .

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.ServiceModel.Activation.AspNetCompatibilityRequirementsMode NotAllowed = int32(0)

Docs.summary: [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] 服务必须在 [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] 兼容模式设置为 的应用程序域中运行。 services must run in an application domain with [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] compatibility mode set to .

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.ServiceModel.Activation.AspNetCompatibilityRequirementsMode Required = int32(2)

Docs.summary: [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] 服务必须在 [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] 兼容模式设置为 的应用程序域中运行。 services must run in an application domain with [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] compatibility mode set to .
